list-item.label: (I)
list-item.p: Blood schizonticides or suppressive agents: drugs that act on the asexual forms of the parasite found in the bloodstream;

list-item.label: (II)
list-item.p: Tissue schizonticides: drugs that act on the asexual forms of the parasite found in the tissues;

list-item.label: (III)
list-item.p: Gametocytes: drugs that act on the sexual forms of the parasites;

list-item.label: (IV)
list-item.p: Sporonticides: drugs that act indirectly on the vegetative forms found in the mosquito vector through gametocytes;

list-item.label: (V)
list-item.p: Sporozoiticides: drugs that act on the forms of the parasite infecting the host.
